ABOUT ME

I’m Boyi Li (李博一), a senior student in TONGJI University, China. My major is Software Engineering.

Professional

As a fast-learning developer, I’d already involed in many different development skills. Among all programming languages, Objective-C and C# are my specialists. But I never limit myself to some specific skills or domains. The world is changing with an unprecedented speed, epscially the IT industry. And I take myself as a person who meets the challenges positively. Here is more details about my career.

Hobbies

I’m an addicted runner. I was crushed on this clean, efficient and unlimited exercise way since the first time I ran on playground. And I have participated in several running activities, like Shanghai Marathon.

In addition, I’m passionate to explore unknown things, and enjoyable from changing my lifestyle.

About This Blog

This blog is not just limited to development articles. I will keep posting anything about my life, my thoughts, etc.. And maybe these posts will keep me one day.
